snippet.title: Exyl - Ping! 2
snippet.description:
IM BACK BABY. I'VE LEVELED UP.

This is a huge project for me. I went all out on the song and animation =)
Back in Ping 1, the flute part was just goofy text spelling out "F L U T E"... I lacked the skill to animate actual flute-playing. I've come a long way since! What you'll find here is a culmination of my progress in composition, music theory, 3D design, and character animation. A new chapter for me as an artist.
Wallpapers and merch: https://exyl.shop/

𝐈        ● Can I use this song for YouTube or Twitch? Yes use it! Please credit me in your description. I had to deal with too many thieves & false claims, so to protect my work, you might get a pre-emptive claim from my friends at State51. If you wish to monetize your video, or would like to discuss a commercial license, please reach out!
𝐈𝐈       ● Download here // https://www.toneden.io/exyl/post/ping-2
𝐈𝐈𝐈     ● Buy the HD version // https://exyl.bandcamp.com/track/ping-2
𝐈𝐕     ● Bpm of the song is 120 but beware; from 0:00 to 0:09 it is a cinematic part with no bpm.
𝐕      ● Discord // https://discord.gg/exyl
𝐕𝐈     ● Spotify // https://spoti.fi/3upImMb
𝐕𝐈𝐈    ● Apple Music // https://apple.co/33ZFFG8
𝐕𝐈𝐈𝐈  ● Soundcloud // https://soundcloud.com/exyl_sounds/ping-2
𝐈𝐗           ● Newgrounds // https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1107630
𝐗           ● Epilepsy warning.
𝐗𝐈       ● Exact title: Exyl - Ping! 2
𝐗𝐈𝐈   ● The singer is from a vocal pack on splice. I am not legally allowed to use her name as per the sample pack's guidelines. Some assets I do not fully own such as Discord sound effects, Kristof Dedene assets, Callisto by Rukiruki //
𝐗𝐈𝐈𝐈● Lyrics: You better fight, You better fight for me, Go (whisper).

-

#Exyl #Complextro #FLUTEGANG
